text.text: Upgrades are modifiers added to tools using upgrade recipes. Each tool has a limited number of upgrade slots to start, though the number of slots can be increased in a few ways.
Many of the upgrades listed in general, weapon, bonus damage, and general work on armor as well!
General upgrades work well on any tool! These upgrades will enhance your tool all around, by increasing its attack damage, mining speed, durability, and more!
